Event.name: Getting_scenario
Event.definition: <def-root>In this scenario, the <fen>Recipient</fen> begins without the <fen>Theme</fen>, then acquires the <fen>Theme</fen> from a <fen>Source</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Recipient
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Recipient</fen> indicates the entity that ends up in possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Theme</fen> is the object that changes possession.</def-root>

Arg.name: Source
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Source</fen> is the location that the <fen>Theme</fen> formerly occupied. Persons that begin in possession of the <fen>Theme</fen> may metonymically stand in for the <fen>Source</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The purpose for which an intentional act is performed.</def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> refers to the existing eventuality that the <fen>Recipient</fen> is responding to.</def-root>
